name: Nordica Belle 72 ca

features: Plate: FDT Free Demo Plate Short
Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Sidewall

originalDescription: Some of life’s greatest lessons are found on the slopes—discover them with Nordica’s Belle 72 CA. Especially playful and fun, it’s tailored to the needs of beginner and intermediate skiers who love to ski on trails. The Belle 72 CA also offers exceptional stability to amplify your confidence. A shorter binding plate boosts your ability to flex the ski and initiate turns. And by lowering the position of the rear plate, Nordica’s Natural Stance technology creates a more natural, centered position that maximizes control. Embrace the mountain—and your potential—with Nordica’s Belle 72 CA.

name: Nordica Belle 73

features: Plate: FDT Free Demo Plate Short

originalDescription: Nordica’s Belle 73 fuels your love for skiing. Playful and confident, this women’s ski is designed specifically for beginners and intermediates who love to ski on-piste. The Belle 73 is easy to maneuver and provides a smooth and stable ride that amplifies fun. A shorter binding plate boosts your ability to flex the ski and initiate turns. And by lowering the position of the rear plate, Nordica’s Natural Stance technology creates a more natural, centered position that maximizes control. Chase down your passion for skiing with Nordica’s Belle 73.

name: Nordica Belle 75

features: Plate: FDT Free Demo Plate Short

originalDescription: Turn the trails into your canvas with Nordica’s Belle 75. Playful and confident, this women’s ski is perfect for beginners and intermediates who love to spend their days on-piste. With a slightly wider waist, the Belle 75 provides excellent stability—especially in variable conditions. A shorter binding plate boosts your ability to flex the ski and initiate turns. And by lowering the position of the rear plate, Nordica’s Natural Stance technology creates a more natural, centered position that maximizes control. Make your mark all over the trails with Nordica’s Belle 75.

name: Nordica Belle dc 72

features: Plate: FDT Hp Free Demo Plate Short
Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Pulse Core + Sidewall

originalDescription: Whether you’re lapping groomers with friends or simply enjoying some solitude, Nordica’s Belle DC 72 keeps you smiling. Especially playful and fun, it’s tailored to the needs of intermediate and advanced skiers. Nordica’s new Double Core technology embeds a shock-absorbing Pulse core between two wood cores to create a calm yet powerful ride that amplifies confidence. A shorter binding plate boosts your ability to flex the ski and initiate turns. And by lowering the position of the rear plate, Nordica’s Natural Stance technology provides a more natural, centered position that maximizes control. Take charge of the trails with Nordica’s Belle DC 72.

name: Nordica Belle dc 78

features: Plate: FDT Hp Free Demo Plate Short
Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Pulse Core + Sidewall

originalDescription: Nordica’s Belle DC 78 loves to make turns all over the mountain. Especially playful and fun, this all-new women’s ski is perfect for intermediate and advanced skiers who spend their days on-piste. For a smooth yet powerful ride that amplifies confidence, Nordica’s new Double Core technology embeds a shock-absorbing Pulse core between two wood cores. The ski’s wider waist enhances versatility while a shorter binding plate boosts your ability to flex the ski and initiate turns. And by lowering the position of the rear plate, Nordica’s Natural Stance technology provides a more natural, centered position that maximizes control. Embrace every trail with Nordica’s Belle DC 78.

name: Nordica Belle sl dc fdt

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Metal + Pulse Core + Sidewall

originalDescription: Amplify your skiing–and smile the whole time–with Nordica’s Belle SL DC. With a focus on power and precision, this high-performance ski is incredibly quick, lively, and smooth. To boost your confidence and control, the Belle SL DC showcases a Double Core construction, which sandwiches a sheet of titanal and an elastomer layer between two wood cores. This also creates an intuitive and stable ride. And the ski’s narrower waist makes it incredibly easy to initiate turns while providing lightning fast edge-to-edge transitions. Whether you’re searching for the perfect arc or simply lapping groomers with friends, Nordica’s Belle SL DC elevates your skiing and magnifies your fun.

name: Nordica Dob. dh wc dept edt plate
model: Dob. dh wc dept edt plate

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall

originalDescription: Proven to win on the World Cup by Dominik Paris, the DH WC DEPT EDT is your weapon of choice for going fast. Featuring ENERGY 2 TITANIUM core construction and EDT plate for power transmission, torsional stability, edge grip and top-end speed.

name: Nordica Dob. gs wc dept plate

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall

originalDescription: Powerful, precise, and fearless, the Dobermann GS WC Dept enables the best skiers in the world to unleash their full potential. With the perfect blend of wood and metal, the ski offers exceptional control and response to boost your confidence and performance. Available in either a soft or stiff flex, it features a 10 mm Marker Piston Plate to further enhance the transmission of energy. And to answer the need for speed, the ski is hand-finished to ensure it’s race-ready. Proven again and again on the World Cup circuit, the Dobermann GS WC Dept is ready to take your racing to the next level.

name: Nordica Dob. sg wc dept edt plate
model: Dob. sg wc dept edt plate

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall

originalDescription: Proven to win on the World Cup by Dominik Paris, the SG WC DEPT EDT is your weapon of choice for going fast. Featuring ENERGY 2 TITANIUM core construction and EDT plate for power transmission, torsional stability, edge grip and top-end speed.

name: Nordica Dob. sl wc dept plate

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall

originalDescription: With a thirst for speed and a reputation for precision, the Dobermann SL WC Dept holds nothing back. At home on the World Cup circuit, this legendary slalom ski provides explosive turn initiation and fast-as-lightning edge changes that inspire confidence. For exceptional control and stability, it features the perfect blend of wood and metal and is available with either a soft or stiff flex. A slightly thicker 14 mm Marker Piston Plate maximizes the transmission of power and provides the leverage that slalom turns demand. And to support your pursuit of the podium, each ski is hand-finished and race-ready. No wonder it’s a favorite among some of the best skiers in the world. Take control—and never look back—with the Dobermann SL WC Dept.

name: Nordica Dobermann combi pro s (jr 4.5 fdt)

features: Plate: FDT Jr RTL S (100 - 110) / FDT Jr RTL L (120-130)+RS
Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Sidewall

originalDescription: The Combi PRO S combines the best of both worlds by bridging the gap between unique discipline GS and SL skis. Featuring a World Cup style, wood core sandwich construction for maximum performance and edge grip, and a progressive size appropriate flex, it’s the perfect entry level option for junior U8 - U14 athletes looking to develop the basic fundamentals of ski racing. The Combi PRO S is the ultimate one ski quiver for young aspiring racers.

name: Nordica Dobermann combi pro s (jr 7.0 fdt)

features: Plate: FDT Jr RTL S (100 - 110) / FDT Jr RTL L (120-162)+RS
Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Sidewall

originalDescription: The Combi PRO S combines the best of both worlds by bridging the gap between unique discipline GS and SL skis. Featuring a World Cup style, wood core sandwich construction for maximum performance and edge grip, and a progressive size appropriate flex, it’s the perfect entry level option for junior U8 - U14 athletes looking to develop the basic fundamentals of ski racing. The Combi PRO S is the ultimate one ski quiver for young aspiring racers.

name: Nordica Dobermann gs race plate

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall

originalDescription: If your days are defined by fast and fluid turns and gunning for the podium, the Dobermann GS Race is ready to amplify your skiing. For exceptional stability and response, this FIS-approved ski features the perfect blend of wood and metal and a flex tailored to up-and-coming U14 and U16 racers not yet ready for a ski with a full adult construction. A 10 mm Marker Piston plate further enhances the transmission of power. And to help you reach your full potential, the ski has a race-ready finish. Dream big and ski hard with the Dobermann GS Race.

name: Nordica Dobermann gsc fdt
originalDescription: Lightness and simplicity: Dobermann GSC will let you live full days on snow, without ever getting tired. This brand new model has been specially designed for skiers who love to draw wide arches on the slope without overworking, thanks to the wooden core without layers of titanal which facilitates the execution of the gesture in every phase of the curve. An agile GS ski that reflects the characteristics of our Dobermann GSR, but certainly less demanding, and so really useful for improving your technical skills. Simplicity and easy handling, without ever giving up on performance. The Dobermann GSC is your faithful travel companion to close the lifts with your friends.

name: Nordica Dobermann gsj plate

features: Plate: Junior Racing Plate New S (136-150) / L (157-171)
Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall

originalDescription: Looking for the perfect line? The new Dobermann GSJ Plate has mastered the path from the start gate to the podium. For exceptional control and response, this GS ski features the optimal blend of wood and metal with a softer flex tailored to the needs of developing racers. It also inspires confidence by offering exceptional edge hold and making it especially easy to initiate turns. The new Marker Junior Race Plate further enhances the transmission of power. Smaller-sized versions of the ski feature this plate in a two-piece design to ensure the proper flex. And to help you attack the course and reach your full potential, it has a race-ready finish. For fluid turns and fast times, team up with the Dobermann GSJ Plate.

name: Nordica Dobermann gsr dc fdt

features: Plate: FDT Race Plate Pro N
Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Double Core + Sidewall + Carbon

originalDescription: A good turn is a work of art–and whether you’re arcing turns on corduroy or dominating the local race league, Nordica’s Dobermann GSR DC is ready to carve a masterpiece. Armed with a thirst for speed and precision, it’s at home carving big, long turns. Its all-new Double Core construction sandwiches a wood core and an elastomer layer between two sheets of titanal. This amplifies power and control while delivering an especially smooth and stable ride. The Dobermann GSR DC also features an entirely new two-piece plate made from zinc and aluminum. This plate boosts torsional rigidity for incredible response and quick edge-to-edge transitions. And thanks to a free-floating design, it ensures the ski can flex naturally for optimal performance–and unrivaled confidence. Make the turns of your dreams with Nordica’s Dobermann GSR DC.

name: Nordica Dobermann multigara dc fdt

features: Plate: FDT Race Plate Pro N
Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Double Core + Sidewall + Carbon

originalDescription:
Nordica’s Dobermann Multigara DC is ready to star in your dreams. Armed with incredible versatility, it’s equally at home making snappy turns and big, fluid carves. No wonder it’s a favorite among on-piste purists. The Dobermann Mulitgara DC’s
Double Core construction integrates a Pulse Core between two superimposed wood
cores, which are embedded in two layers of Titanal. This delivers exceptional power and precision while also creating an incredibly smooth and stable ride. And to further boost your confidence and control, it sports a new two-piece plate made of zinc and aluminum. This plate maximizes the transmission of energy when initiating turns while allowing the ski to flex naturally for exceptional performance. Nordica’s Dobermann Multigara DC steals the show–and never looks back.

name: Nordica Dobermann multigara dc race

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Double Core + Sidewall + Carbon

originalDescription: Whether you’re gunning for the podium or simply searching for the perfect turn, Nordica’s Dobermann Multigara DC is bound to deliver. With a focus on versatility, it excels at making both snappy turns and big, fluid carves. The Dobermann Multigara DC Race features Nordica’s Double Core construction, which sandwiches a wood core and an elastomer layer between two sheets of titanal. This boosts power and control while creating a ride that’s incredibly smooth and stable. And for even greater response and quicker edge-to-edge transitions, the Dobermann Multigara DC Race sports a Piston Plate. Perfected for those who love to lay down turns on-piste, the ski amplifies your confidence and maximizes your performance. Leave the pack behind with Nordica’s Dobermann Multigara DC Race.

name: Nordica Dobermann sl race plate

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall

name: Nordica Dobermann sl wc plate

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall

originalDescription: The taste of victory is sweet—and you better get used to it when skiing the Dobermann SL Race Plate. For exceptional power and lightning fast edge-to-edge transitions, this FIS-approved slalom ski features the perfect blend of wood and metal and a flex tailored to up-and-coming U14 and U16 racers not yet ready for a ski with a full adult construction. A 10mm Marker Piston plate further enhances the transmission of power. And for maximum speed, it sports a race-ready finish. To amplify your confidence and control, attack the course with the Dobermann SL Race Plate.

name: Nordica Dobermann slc fdt
originalDescription: The most forgiving model in the Dobermann family, the DOBERMANN SLC is best suited for those that love easy going on piste carving. High performance in nature, but built with a wood core and no metal, it’s lighter and less taxing, making it ideal for less aggressive skiers. Its multi-radius shape featuring an oversized SL tip shape allows for quick and easy turn initiation while the GS waist and tail enable everything from big sweeping turns to quick short-radius arcs. And the new Recoil Power Plate makes for a smooth flex with added stability. If you’re looking for a forgiving carving ski that’s versatile and easy to turn, the Dobermann SLC is your ski.

name: Nordica Dobermann slj plate

features: Plate: Junior Racing Plate New S (121-135) / L (142-149)
Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall

originalDescription: As powerful as it is precise, the completely-redesigned Dobermann SLJ Plate provides the confidence you need to push your limits. For exceptional stability and response, this slalom ski features an entirely new construction that embeds a full-length metal sheet on top of a wood core. This makes it especially easy for developing racers to flex the ski while amplifying control and providing quick edge changes. The all-new Marker Junior Race Plate further enhances the transmission of power. Smaller-sized versions of the ski feature this plate in a two-piece design to ensure the proper flex. And to support your pursuit of the podium, it has a race-ready finish. Greatness lies within you—unleash it with the Dobermann SLJ Plate.

name: Nordica Dobermann slr dc fdt

features: Plate: FDT Race Plate Pro N
Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Double Core + Sidewall + Carbon

originalDescription: Whether you’re on the race course or far from it, Nordica’s Dobermann SLR DC yearns to turn. With an appetite for short, explosive turns, it delivers maximum power and precision. The Dobermann SLR DC’s all-new Double Core construction sandwiches a wood core and an elastomer layer between two sheets of titanal. In addition to boosting confidence and control, this delivers an especially smooth and stable ride. The Dobermann SLR DC also showcases a new two-piece plate made of zinc and aluminum. This plate amplifies response for lightning fast edge-to-edge transitions while allowing the ski to flex naturally for optimal performance. Unleash your best–attack each turn with Nordica’s Dobermann SLR DC.

name: Nordica Enforcer 100

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall + Carbon

originalDescription: Guided by a commitment to relentless refinement, Nordica has completely reimagined the Enforcer 100. Thanks to a new construction and an upgraded tip design, this best-selling ski offers a more playful feel and even greater versatility—while continuing to deliver its legendary all mountain performance. For a trusted ride that’s especially smooth and stable, it pairs an all new carbon chassis with a new core profile and two sheets of metal. In addition to dampening vibrations and reducing weight, this creates a more forgiving ski that also maximizes stability and response. And to boost confidence in variable conditions, the Enforcer features an early rise tip and slight tail rocker with traditional camber under foot. Armed with a modern design, it allows you to ski how you want—where you want. Smoother and more playful than ever, the new Enforcer 100 redefines what an all mountain ski can do.

name: Nordica Enforcer 104

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall + Pulse Core

originalDescription: Whether chasing powder in the trees, lacing turns in softer snow, or lapping spring slush, Nordica’s all-new Enforcer 104 makes the best days even better. As the widest ski in the Enforcer collection, it provides a ride that’s as playful as it is versatile. Thanks to a fresh construction that embeds both a wood core and an elastomer Pulse core between two layers of titanal, this all-mountain ski is uniquely smooth and powerful–yet also forgiving. No wonder you’ll be grinning ear-to-ear in both soft snow and variable conditions. The mountains are calling–experience everything they have to offer with Nordica’s Enforcer 104.

name: Nordica Enforcer 104 free

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall + Carbon

originalDescription: Day in and day out, the Enforcer 104 Free boosts your confidence. Although it’s the newest addition to the Enforcer Free collection, it’s already renowned for providing power and versatility in a design that’s accessible and easy to ski—no matter the terrain or conditions. The Enforcer 104 Free pairs a wood core with carbon and two sheets of metal to maximize stability and response. This also dampens vibrations for an especially smooth ride. And for exceptional floatation in powder and easy steering through variable conditions, it features a high rise tip and tail rocker. If you’re a progressive skier searching for the perfect daily driver, it’s time to meet your soulmate—the Enforcer 104 Free. Powerful and poppy, it’s at home everywhere and anywhere.

name: Nordica Enforcer 104 unlimited

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Carbon + Sidewall

originalDescription: Indulge your thirst for adventure with Nordica’s Enforcer Unlimited 104. Inspired by our legendary Enforcer collection, this all-mountain touring ski is at home exploring the resort and helping you earn your turns. Especially easy to ski, the Enforcer Unlimited 104’s lightweight construction creates a playful and stable ride that maximizes efficiency on the way up and the ride down. The ski’s wide waist provides additional stability and plenty of floatation in deep snow. And to boost confidence and maneuverability in variable conditions, it features an early rise tip and tail rocker with traditional camber underfoot. No matter how you define adventure, the Enforcer Unlimited 104 will help you pursue it.

name: Nordica Enforcer 110 free

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall + Carbon

originalDescription: How do you make a powder day even better? Spend it on the Enforcer 110 Free. Designed to cater to soft snow, the Enforcer 110 Free is as powerful as it is playful. To keep the ski’s weight in check while maximizing fun, it pairs a balsa wood core with carbon and two sheets of metal. This design also enhances response and dampens vibrations for an especially smooth ride. And to blast through crud and offer additional floatation, the Enforcer 110 Free sports a high rise tip and tail rocker profile. For all mountain performance tailored to soft snow, choose the Enforcer 110 Free.

name: Nordica Enforcer 80 s

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Sidewall

originalDescription: Kids need skis that help them progress and push their limits—not hold them back. Guided by this belief, the Enforcer 80S brings the legendary performance of our Enforcer Collection to those who are shaping skiing’s future. Armed with a full wood core, this ski provides a soft, even flex with exceptional edge hold and response for a smooth and predictable ride. Its early rise tip and tail rocker enhances versatility, offering flotation in softer snow and the ability to readily absorb bumps and blast through crud. As playful as it is powerful, the Enforcer 80S helps young, progressive skiers unleash their potential and maximize their fun.

name: Nordica Enforcer 88

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall + Carbon

originalDescription: Powerful and precise, the Enforcer 88 yearns to turn. Skiers who spend most of their time on trails love its stability and penchant for speed. Armed with a narrower waist, it pairs a full wood core with two sheets of metal and carbon stringers that run the length of the ski. In addition to dampening vibrations for an especially smooth ride, this creates an energetic ski that’s exceptionally responsive and quick edge-to-edge. Its early rise tip and slight tail rocker enhances versatility, offering a nimble attitude and the ability to readily absorb bumps. And although it’s the newest addition to the Enforcer collection, this ski already has a reputation for boosting confidence, performance, and fun. Carve your signature all over the mountain with the Enforcer 88.

name: Nordica Enforcer 88 unlimited

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Carbon + Sidewall

originalDescription: When adventure calls, Nordica’s Enforcer Unlimited 88 is ready to answer. For exceptional performance and versatility, this all-mountain ski pairs Nordica’s legendary Enforcer design with game-changing touring capabilities. Especially easy to turn and maneuver, the ski features a lightweight construction that also maximizes efficiency on the ascent. An early rise tip and slight tail rocker with traditional camber underfoot further boost your confidence and control. And as the narrowest and lightest ski in the Enforcer Unlimited collection, it excels on-trail and touring at the resort. The mountains are calling—embrace them with the Enforcer Unlimited 88.

name: Nordica Enforcer 89

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall + Pulse Core

originalDescription: Nothing compares to a good turn–especially one made with Nordica’s Enforcer 89. For an especially smooth and stable ride, it showcases a fresh construction that embeds both a wood core and an elastomer Pulse core between two layers of titanal. This also creates an energetic ski that maximizes fun and is incredibly responsive and quick edge-to-edge. To amplify your confidence and control, the ski features an early rise tip and tail rocker with traditional camber underfoot. And thanks to a wider waist, it’s at home both at the resort and far from it. Make each day one to remember with Nordica’s Enforcer Unlimited 94.

name: Nordica Enforcer 99

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Sidewall + Pulse Core

originalDescription: Nordica’s Enforcer 99 embodies everything an all-mountain ski should be–and perfects it. Incredibly playful and versatile, it’s at home in any terrain and all conditions. For an remarkably smooth and powerful ride, the Enforcer 99 features a fresh construction that embeds both a wood core and an elastomer Pulse core between two layers of titanal. Combined with a wider waist, this construction maximizes control and response while also excelling in softer snow. This ski inherits the legendary performance of the Enforcer collection–and then builds upon it to amplify your confidence. Ski everything with ease with Nordica’s Enforcer 99.

name: Nordica Santa ana 102

originalDescription: Nordica’s Santa Ana 102 keeps you smiling from first chair to last. name: Nordica Santa ana 93

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Terrain Specific Metal + Carbon + Sidewall

originalDescription: With unmatched versatility, the Santa Ana 93 easily handles both on and off-trail terrain while providing a balanced and stable feel. And although it loves making fluid turns on groomers, it’s at home anywhere thanks to an entirely new construction and shape. A wood core paired with carbon and a sheet of terrain-specific metal make the ski lighter and easier to maneuver. This fresh design also boosts confidence by enhancing edge hold and dampening vibrations for a smooth and stable ride. The Santa Ana 93’s shorter radius makes it easy to control turns and transition between them. And because its 93 mm waist offers exceptional versatility, it’s the perfect daily driver for women looking to carve groomers and explore the entire mountain. Light, powerful, and playful the Santa Ana 93 is the most balanced ski in the collection.

name: Nordica Santa ana 93 unlimited

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Carbon + Sidewall

originalDescription: Whether at the resort or far from it, make each day one to remember with Nordica’s Santa Ana Unlimited 93. For exceptional performance and versatility, this women’s all-mountain touring ski infuses our legendary Santa Ana design with game-changing uphill advantages. To amplify your confidence, the Santa Ana Unlimited 93 features a lightweight construction that provides a playful ride and maximum efficiency. The ski’s shorter radius also makes it easy to control turns and navigate challenging terrain. And while it loves to tour, this ski is equally at home lapping the lifts. Pursue your passion—and thirst for adventure—with Nordica’s Santa Ana Unlimited 93.

name: Nordica Santa ana 97

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Terrain Specific Metal + Sidewall + Pulse Core

originalDescription: The mountains have so much to offer–enjoy it all with Nordica’s Santa Ana 97. Incredibly playful and versatile, this all-mountain ski is at home in any terrain and all conditions. For an especially smooth, the Santa Ana 97 features a fresh construction that pairs both a wood core and an elastomer Pulse core with a sheet of terrain-specific metal. Combined with a wider waist, this construction amplifies control and response while also excelling in softer snow. The ski inherits the legendary performance of the Santa Ana collection–and then builds upon it to boost your confidence and fun. Ski what you love and love what you ski with Nordica’s Santa Ana 97.

name: Nordica Santa ana 98

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Terrain Specific Metal + Carbon + Sidewall

originalDescription: If you’re looking for a wider all mountain ski that can carve groomers and give you confidence in fresh snow, the Santa Ana 98 is the perfect choice. This new ski reimagines what’s possible while building on the legendary performance and versatility of the Santa Ana collection. Thanks to a fresh construction that pairs a wood core with carbon and a sheet of terrain-specific metal, the Santa Ana 98 offers a ride that’s especially smooth and stable. This design also reduces weight and enhances edge hold and response to inspire confidence and keep you in control. Whether ducking in the trees on a powder day or skiing groomers with friends, the Santa Ana 98 allows you to ski everywhere with confidence.

name: Nordica Spitfire 68 dc fdt

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Pulse Core + Sidewall

originalDescription: For a good time, look no further than Nordica’s Spitfire DC 68. Armed with a multi-radius design, the Spitfire is as playful as it is versatile. To boost your confidence and control, it features Nordica’s Energy Double Core, which positions a shock-absorbing elastomer layer between two wood cores. This also creates a ride that’s especially smooth and forgiving. And the ski’s 68 mm waist further amplifies precision and response, offering incredibly fast edge-to-edge transitions. Tailored to the needs of on-piste purists, the Spitfire loves to lay down turns on fresh corduroy and firm snow. Keep smiling turn after turn with Nordica’s Spitfire DC 68.

name: Nordica Spitfire 73 fdt
originalDescription: The exclusive multi-radius construction, that combines different geometries and allows the ski to have different radiuses, has also been applied to less-aggressive and easier-to-manage models. This is the case of the Spitfire 73, whose new sidecuts and 73mm width under the foot guarantee versatility and handling even at low speeds, when the primary objective is to improve your skills on the snow and make the necessary quality leap to pass to the most demanding models.

name: Nordica Spitfire 74 dc fdt

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Pulse Core + Sidewall

originalDescription: Nordica’s Spitfire lives up to its name. Armed with no shortage of personality, the Spitfire DC 74 is as playful as it is powerful. Its multi-radius design is equally at home serving up short, explosive turns and big, sweeping carves. For exceptional control and response, it showcases Nordica’s Energy Double Core, which positions a shock-absorbing elastomer layer between two wood cores. This boosts precision and response while creating a ride that’s remarkably smooth and forgiving. And for exceptional versatility, it features a 74 mm waist that’s especially stable–even in the most demanding conditions. Spirited, lively, and incredibly fun, Nordica’s Spitfire DC 74 is always ready to play.

name: Nordica Spitfire 75 fdt
originalDescription: The exclusive multi-radius construction that combines different geometries and allows the ski to have different radiuses, has also been applied to less-aggressive and easier-to-manage models. This is the case of the Spitfire 75, whose 75mm width under the foot guarantees versatility and ease in any type of condition, both on the first compact snows in the morning and on the most ruined ones in the afternoon hours.

name: Nordica Spitfire ca fdt
originalDescription:
The exclusive multi-radius construction that combines different geometries and allows the ski to have different radiuses, has also been applied to less-aggressive and easier-to-manage models.
This is the case of the Spitfire CA, a simple and intuitive ski to vary the curve arch to your taste, with unmatched ease.

name: Nordica Spitfire dc 68 pro fdt

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Pulse Core + Sidewall

originalDescription: A good turn is a thing of beauty–and Nordica’s Spitfire DC 68 Pro loves to make them. Built for on-piste purists who demand a high performance carving ski, it features a multi-radius design that offers tremendous versatility. The Spitfire DC 68 Pro’s Energy TI Double Core construction sandwiches a sheet of titanal and an elastomer layer between two wood cores. This delivers exceptional control and response while also creating a ride that’s especially smooth and forgiving. And thanks to its narrower waist, the Spitfire DC 68 Pro provides lightning fast edge-to-edge transitions for explosive turns and exceptional confidence on firm snow. Lay down your masterpiece with Nordica’s Spitfire DC 68 Pro.

name: Nordica Spitfire dc 74 pro fdt

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Pulse Core + Sidewall

originalDescription: From first chair to last, Nordica’s Spitfire DC 74 Pro simply loves to turn. Incredibly playful and versatile thanks to its multi-radius design, it’s tailored to the needs of on-piste skiers who demand exceptional performance. For tremendous power and control, it showcases Nordica’s Energy TI Double Core, which sandwiches a sheet of titanal and an elastomer layer between two wood cores. This also provides a lively ride that’s incredibly smooth and forgiving. And to further boost your confidence and help unleash your potential, its 74 mm waist enhances versatility, making it the perfect daily driver for those who hold nothing back. Turn after turn, Nordica’s Spitfire DC 74 Pro delivers on-piste perfection.

name: Nordica Spitfire dc 80 pro fdt

features: Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Pulse Core + Sidewall

originalDescription: The search for the perfect turn isn’t dependent on perfect conditions. Guided by this belief, Nordica’s Spitfire DC 80 Pro delivers exceptional performance–and tremendous versatility. For unparalleled power and control, it showcases Nordica’s Energy TI Double Core, which sandwiches a sheet of titanal and an elastomer layer between two wood cores. And to boost confidence and stability, it features a wider waist that readily adapts to soft snow and variable conditions. Simply put, it’s a carving ski with an all-mountain soul, making it the perfect companion for all-day on-piste skiing. Fuel your passion with Nordica’s Spitfire DC 80 Pro.

name: Nordica Spitfire ti fdt
originalDescription: Like all models in the Spitfire family, the Ti is a high-performance carving ski made for those who love skiing groomers. But since it’s built with a wood core and only one sheet of metal, it’s not as demanding, making it ideal for less aggressive skiers. The ski’s oversized SL tip shape allows for quick and easy turn initiation while the GS waist and tail enable everything from big sweeping turns to quick short-radius arcs. And the new Race Plate makes for a smooth flex with added stability. If you’re looking for a versatile carving ski that’s playful and easy to turn, the Spitfire Ti is exactly what you need.

name: Nordica Steadfast 75 ca fdt
originalDescription: Discover your potential–and unlock everything the mountain has to offer–with Nordica’s Steadfast 75 CA. Designed for beginner and intermediate skiers, this all-mountain ski is especially playful and versatile. Thanks to its narrower waist and rocker-camber blend, the Steadfast 75 CA is especially easy to maneuver. To boost your confidence and accelerate your progression, it features a lightweight sidewall construction that uses two wood stringers and a layer of carbon. This provides a smooth and stable ride that’s incredibly forgiving. The Steadfast makes turning especially easy, yet it’s also at home sliding more relaxed turns. Ski your best–and have the time of your life–with Nordica’s Steadfast 75 CA.

name: Nordica Steadfast 80 ca fdt

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Sidewall

originalDescription: Whether you’re skiing groomers with friends, grinning through the trees and bumps, or seeking out soft snow, Nordica’s Steadfast 80 CA loves to embrace the entire mountain. Especially playful and versatile, it features a full wood core. This creates a smooth and agile ride that boosts your confidence and elevates your performance. And thanks to an all-mountain shape and a blend of rocker and camber, the Steadfast 80 CA makes turning especially easy while also excelling at sliding more relaxed turns. Explore everything the mountain has to offer with Nordica’s Steadfast 80 CA.

name: Nordica Steadfast 85 dc fdt

features: Plate: FDT Hp Free Demo Plate
Core / Materials: Performance Wood + Metal + Pulse Core + Sidewall

originalDescription: Nordica’s Steadfast 85 TI DC proves that performance shouldn’t come at the expense of fun. Armed with an appetite for the entire mountain, this all-mountain ski is as playful as it is versatile. Its Energy TI Double Core sandwiches a shock-absorbing elastomer layer and a sheet of titanal between two wood cores. This amplifies your confidence and control while delivering a ride that’s playful and forgiving. And thanks to a wider waist, it’s at home in any terrain and all conditions. Whether lapping groomers with friends, skiing the bumps and trees, or laying down fresh tracks, Nordica’s Steadfast 85 TI DC is ready to elevate your game and your memories.

name: Nordica Team am fdt (100-140)

features: Plate: FDT Jr RTL S (100 - 110) / FDT Jr RTL L (120-140)+RS

originalDescription: The perfect skis to start having for our young guns. Soft flex and easy turns guaranteed, this is the best option for the small riders who need to improve their skills. Built to be the main character of your first amazing experiences and adventures around the mountain.

name: Nordica Unleashed 108

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Terrain Specific Metal + Carbon + Sidewall

originalDescription: Make the mountains your canvas with Nordica’s Unleashed 108. Built for the modern freeskier, it craves deep snow and big terrain. Inspired by Nordica’s Unleashed 108, it features a thinner core that’s perfect for lighter skiers and those seeking an even more playful ride. To boost your confidence, the Unleashed 108 pairs a wood core with carbon and a sheet of terrain-specific metal. This dampens vibrations to keep you smiling–no matter the conditions. Traditional camber underfoot provides excellent response and plenty of pop. And the ski’s early rise tip and tail maximize flotation on deep days. Playful and powerful, the Unleashed enables you to let loose your creativity with every turn–no matter the terrain. Make each day a masterpiece with Nordica’s Unleashed 108.

name: Nordica Unleashed 114

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Terrain Specific Metal + Carbon + Sidewall

originalDescription: When the snow is deep, run wild with Nordica’s Unleashed 114. Driven by a love for pow days and softer snow, this modern freeski makes the best days even better. To elevate your confidence, it pairs a wood core with carbon and a sheet of terrain-specific metal. This enhances edgehold and dampens vibrations for an especially smooth ride. Camber underfoot ensures the ski tracks true to your intentions. And thanks to its wide waist and early rise tip and tail, it floats effortlessly through deep snow. There’s nothing like a pow day–especially when you’re enjoying it with Nordica’s Unleashed 114.

name: Nordica Unleashed 90

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Sidewall

originalDescription: Set yourself free with Nordica’s Unleashed 90. Designed for up-and-coming rippers, this modern freeski is as playful as it is versatile. To boost the confidence of younger skiers, it features a full wood core with a vertical sidewall. This design enhances edge hold while offering a smooth ride that maximizes performance. Its rocker profile is at home no matter the terrain or conditions. And for exceptional stability and plenty of pop, the Unleashed 90 sports traditional camber underfoot. Its early rise tip and tail provide floatation on deep days and give you the freedom to play with style. Dream big and be you with Nordica’s Unleashed 90.

name: Nordica Unleashed 98

features: Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Terrain Specific Metal + Carbon + Sidewall

originalDescription: Whether slashing pow, ripping bumps, or snaking through the trees, Nordica’s Unleashed 98 is at home anywhere. Built for the modern freeskier, it offers a playful ride without sacrificing performance. To boost your confidence, the Unleashed 98 pairs a wood core with carbon and a sheet of terrain-specific metal. This design enhances edge hold and dampens vibrations for an especially smooth ride. Its rocker profile easily handles any terrain and all conditions and for exceptional response and plenty of pop, the Unleashed 98 sports traditional camber underfoot. Its early rise tip and tail provide floatation on deep days and are at home buttering around the mountain. And thanks to its wide waist, the Unleashed 98 offers tremendous versatility, making it the perfect daily driver. Roam wild and free with Nordica’s Unleashed 98.

name: Nordica Unleashed j fdt

features: Plate: FDT Jr RTL S (108 - 118) / FDT Jr RTL L (128-148)+RS

originalDescription: The next generation of rippers deserves the best—and Nordica’s Unleashed J is a worthy partner in their progression. This modern freeski is perfect for junior skiers who make the entire mountain their playground. To boost their confidence, it features a full wood core that maximizes stability while creating a ride that’s as powerful as it is playful. Its twin-tip design sports camber underfoot and an early rise tip and tail rocker. This makes the ski especially easy to maneuver through mixed conditions and amplifies energy in any terrain. Dream big and drop in with Nordica’s Unleashed J.

name: Nordica Wild belle 74

features: Plate: FDT Free Demo Plate Short

originalDescription: Nordica’s Wild Belle 74 accelerates your progression—and makes you smile. Designed for beginner and intermediate skiers, this all-new women’s ski features a full wood core for a smooth and stable ride. Thanks to its narrower waist and rocker-camber blend, the Wild Belle 74 is especially easy to maneuver. A shorter binding plate also enhances performance by boosting your ability to flex the ski and initiate turns. And by lowering the position of the rear plate, Nordica’s Natural Stance technology provides a more natural, centered position that maximizes control. Confidently explore the entire mountain with Nordica’s Wild Belle 74.

name: Nordica Wild belle 78 ca

features: Plate: FDT Free Demo Plate Short
Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Sidewall

originalDescription: Nordica’s new Wild Belle 78 delivers the confidence you need to tame any trail. Its narrower waist and full wood core provide female skiers with a smooth ride that enhances confidence. Thanks to an all-mountain shape and a blend of rocker and camber, the Wild Belle makes turning especially easy, yet it’s also at home sliding more relaxed turns. A shorter binding plate enhances performance by boosting your ability to flex the ski and initiate turns. And by lowering the position of the rear plate, Nordica’s Natural Stance technology provides a more natural, centered position that boosts control. Chase your dreams down the mountain with Nordica’s Wild Belle 78.

name: Nordica Wild belle dc 84

features: Plate: FDT Hp Free Demo Plate Short
Core / Materials: Lite Performance Wood + Pulse Core + Sidewall

originalDescription: Take control of the entire mountain with Nordica’s all-new Wild Belle DC84. Equipped with a wider waist, this all-mountain ski provides female skiers with the confidence they need to tackle any terrain and all conditions. For a calm yet playful and powerful ride that’s stable at any speed, Nordica’s new Double Core technology features a shock-absorbing Pulse core embedded between two wood cores. A shorter binding plate maximizes performance by making it easier to flex the ski and initiate turns. And by lowering the position of the rear plate, Nordica’s Natural Stance technology provides a more natural, centered position that boosts control. Discover your potential—and embrace the entire mountain—with Nordica’s Wild Belle DC84.
